alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 9:56AM CST until March 07 at 12:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Kickapoo River at Readstown affecting Vernon County. For the Kickapoo River...including Ontario, La Farge, Viola, Readstown, Soldiers Grove, Gays Mills, Steuben...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kickapoo River at Readstown. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, The park along the river begins to flood. At 12.0 feet, The park along the river experiences significant flooding. At 13.0 feet, Water is up to the bottom of the Charles Street Bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river has likely crested at this location and should continue to fall. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued early this afternoone by 100 PM CST.
